column2: "It's big! Really, really big! Was that Big Vardha? That is one huge Mech!"
"And how could they expect an ARKS member to go up against something like that? It's totally unfair if you ask me!"
"Fighting one of those things would be suicide. I mean, they're so powerful and solid as a rock. I bet even you couldn't handle it."
"But I know whatever I say won't stop you. I know you by now."
"All I can really do is cheer you on from here, so go give 'em heck. I can't wait to hear your report!"
